title: Upgrader

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Choose a player at night to upgrade one of their abilities during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> Whenever you target someone, at the end of the night you will steal one of their abilities. The target will be informed of this. This happens last, so it won't stop any abilities from happening.

> During the day, you may upgrade the ability however you want. At the end of the day, you will give the role back.

> For payment, you will receive a 1-time use of the original ability you upgraded.

> You may choose someone to upgrade and use one payment ability per night.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: > Upgrade at least 3 different people, and have at least 1 upgrade make a difference in the game.
